full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 110 of 228 786 LC2Qmax3 Alessi - Direct 1 Q. About how often was Ms. Maxwell at the Palm Beach residence during the time you worked there? 2 A. Can you repeat the question? 3 Q. About how often was Ms. Maxwell at the Palm Beach residence during the time you worked there? 4 A. I would say she was with Mr. Epstein 95 percent of the 5 times. 6 Q. Ms. Drescher, could we please pull up what's been marked 7 for identification as Government Exhibit 298. 8 Mr. Alessi, I think that's a binder up next to you. 9 You're welcome, with the Court's permission, to look at a paper 10 copy of 298 if that's easier than the screen. 11 A. No, I think I prefer the screen. 12 Q. Do you recognize this exhibit? 13 A. Yes, this is a -- 14 THE COURT: Sir, I need you to speak to the 15 microphone. Thank you. 16 A. Yes, this is the main floor of the house, the first floor 17 of the house. 18 Q. Is this a fair and accurate depiction of the layout of the 19 first floor of Mr. Epstein's Palm Beach residence? 20 A. Yes, very accurate. 21 MS. COMEY: Your Honor, I offer this in evidence. 22 MR. PAGLIUCA: No objection. 23 THE COURT: PX-298 is admitted. 24 SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 25 DOJ-OGR-00017983
